metaface.interaction
Class KnowledgeBase

java.lang.Object
  metaface.interaction.KnowledgeBase
public class KnowledgeBase
extends Object

This class is an internal representation of a DMTL document. DMTL is defined by the following DMTL structure:

See the DMTL DTD or and example file .

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
InteractionManager, State, DefaultTopic, Evaluate, NextState, PreState, Signal, SubTopic

getResponse

public Response getResponse(Stack path)
Gets a response based on the path

Parameters:
path - The path to the target response
Returns:
A response string consisting of either an absolute path and filename, or a textual response, or null if no response is found
